name: get_data_and_story
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool snapchat_story.
Tool description: Download all stories and account information easy , Channel : https://t.me/keepdeving , Dm : https://t.me/PPooP
API description: Fetches data and story for a given Snapchat username using the RapidAPI service.

user.description: The Snapchat username for which to fetch the data and story.
